e.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.

r.name: Wild Growth
r.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.

passive.name: Illumination
passive.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for a few seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

q.name: Light Binding
q.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.

w.name: Prismatic Barrier
w.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.

e.name: Lucent Singularity
e.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.

r.name: Final Spark
r.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.

passive.name: Granite Shield
passive.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for a few seconds, this effect recharges.

q.name: Seismic Shard
q.description: Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Move Speed for 3 seconds.

w.name: Thunderclap
w.description: Malphite attacks with such force that it creates a sonic boom. For the next few seconds, his attacks create aftershocks in front of him.

e.name: Ground Slam
e.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.

r.name: Unstoppable Force
r.description: Malphite launches himself to a location at high speed, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.

passive.name: Void Shift
passive.description: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

q.name: Call of the Void
q.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.

w.name: Void Swarm
w.description: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.

e.name: Malefic Visions
e.description: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions.If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.

r.name: Nether Grasp
r.description: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.

passive.name: Sap Magic
passive.description: Maokai's basic attack also heals him and deals additional damage on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

q.name: Bramble Smash
q.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.

w.name: Twisted Advance
w.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.

e.name: Sapling Toss
e.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.

r.name: Nature's Grasp
r.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.

passive.name: Double Strike
passive.description: Every few consecutive basic attack, Master Yi strikes twice.

q.name: Alpha Strike
q.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

w.name: Meditate
w.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

e.name: Wuju Style
e.description: Grants bonus true damage on basic attacks.

r.name: Highlander
r.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Move Speed and Attack Speed as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

passive.name: Searing Brilliance
passive.description: Whenever Mel uses an ability, she gains three bonus projectiles (up to nine maximum) on her next attack.When Mel deals damage through an ability or attack, she applies Overwhelm, which can stack infinitely. If the enemy is hit by Mel with enough Overwhelm damage, the stacks are consumed to execute the target.

q.name: Radiant Volley
q.description: Mel fires a barrage of projectiles that explode around a target location, dealing damage repeatedly to enemies within the area.

w.name: Rebuttal
w.description: Mel forms a barrier around herself that reflects enemy projectiles back at the attacker, prevents her from taking damage, and grants her movement speed.

e.name: Solar Snare
e.description: Mel fires a radiant orb forward, rooting those at its center while the area around it slows enemies and deals damage over time.

r.name: Golden Eclipse
r.description: Mel strikes all enemies marked with Overwhelm regardless of their distance from her, dealing additional damage for each stack of Overwhelm.Ranks of Golden Eclipse increase Overwhelm's damage.

passive.name: Fired Up!
passive.description: Milio's abilities enchant allies on touch, making their next damage deal a burst of extra damage and burn the target.

q.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick
q.description: Kick a ball that knocks back an enemy. The ball launches upward on hit and falls toward the enemy, damaging and slowing enemies in the area upon impact.

w.name: Cozy Campfire
w.description: Create an empowering zone that heals allies and increases attack range to those inside. The zone follows the ally nearest to the cast point.

e.name: Warm Hugs
e.description: Milio tosses a shield to an ally, temporarily increasing their movement speed. This ability has 2 charges.

r.name: Breath of Life
r.description: Milio unleashes a wave of soothing flames that heal and remove crowd control effects from allies in range.

passive.name: Love Tap
passive.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.

q.name: Double Up
q.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.

w.name: Strut
w.description: Miss Fortune passively gains Move Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.

e.name: Make It Rain
e.description: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

r.name: Bullet Time
r.description: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike

passive.name: Stone Skin
passive.description: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.

q.name: Crushing Blow
q.description: Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds.

w.name: Warrior Trickster
w.description: Wukong becomes Invisible and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.

e.name: Nimbus Strike
e.description: Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck.

r.name: Cyclone
r.description: Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed.Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.

passive.name: Darkness Rise
passive.description: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and Move Speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions or monsters.

q.name: Obliterate
q.description: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.

w.name: Indestructible
w.description: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.

e.name: Death's Grasp
e.description: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.

r.name: Realm of Death
r.description: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.

passive.name: Soul Siphon
passive.description: Morgana drains spirit from her enemies, healing as she deals damage to champions, large minions, and medium and larger jungler monsters.

q.name: Dark Binding
q.description: Morgana binds an enemy in place with dark magic, forcing them to feel the pain they've caused and dealing magic damage.

w.name: Tormented Shadow
w.description: Morgana casts a cursed shadow on an area, damaging enemies who dare stand in her dark circle. They receive magic damage over time, which increases the lower health they are.

e.name: Black Shield
e.description: Morgana anoints an ally with a protective barrier of starfire, which absorbs magical damage and disabling effects until it is broken.

r.name: Soul Shackles
r.description: Morgana unleashes the full force of her Celestial power as she unbinds her wings and hovers above the ground. She lashes chains of dark pain onto nearby enemy champions, gaining Move Speed. The chains slow and deal initial damage and, after a delay, stun those who are unable to break them.

Naafiri.name: Naafiri
Naafiri.nickname: the Hound of a Hundred Bites

passive.name: We Are More
passive.description: Naafiri spawns packmates that attack the targets of her attacks and abilities.

q.name: Darkin Daggers
q.description: Naafiri hurls up to two daggers, each inflicting bleed, or each inflicting bonus damage if the target is already bleeding.Packmates leap to attack the first champion or monster hit by this skill.

w.name: The Call of the Pack
w.description: Naafiri becomes Untargetable and empowers her pack, spawning additional packmates and gaining increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.

e.name: Eviscerate
e.description: Naafiri dashes and damages enemies in an area around her, recalling her packmates and fully healing them.

r.name: Hounds' Pursuit
r.description: Naafiri and her packmates dash at a champion, dealing damage. Naafiri reveals nearby enemies if she scores a takedown and can recast this Ability once. The second cast grants a shield.

passive.name: Surging Tides
passive.description: When Nami's Abilities hit allied champions they gain Move Speed for a short duration.

q.name: Aqua Prison
q.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.

w.name: Ebb and Flow
w.description: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.

e.name: Tidecaller's Blessing
e.description: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks and spells deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.

r.name: Tidal Wave
r.description: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.

passive.name: Soul Eater
passive.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

q.name: Siphoning Strike
q.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.

w.name: Wither
w.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Move Speed and Attack Speed over time.

e.name: Spirit Fire
e.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.

r.name: Fury of the Sands
r.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

passive.name: Staggering Blow
passive.description: Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.

q.name: Dredge Line
q.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it.

w.name: Titan's Wrath
w.description: Nautilus gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.

e.name: Riptide
e.description: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.

r.name: Depth Charge
r.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.

passive.name: Inherent Glamour
passive.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion or as other units on the map. Receiving immobilizing crowd control, casting damaging spells, damaging enemy towers as a non-champion, or your disguise taking damage equal to its healthbar breaks the disguise.

q.name: Blooming Burst
q.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

w.name: Shapesplitter
w.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack, briefly increasing her move speed. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction and recast to change the direction of the clone.

e.name: Tangle-Barbs
e.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damages and roots everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

r.name: Pop Blossom
r.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air, knocking up all nearby enemies. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and stunned. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

passive.name: Prowl
passive.description: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Move Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Move Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

q.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
q.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.

w.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
w.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.

e.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
e.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.

r.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
r.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.

passive.name: Joy Unending
passive.description: Nilah gains increased experience from last-hitting minions along with the ability to enhance and share nearby healing and shielding from her allies.

q.name: Formless Blade
q.description: With a snap of her whip-blade, Nilah damages any enemies she hits in a straight line in her chosen direction. This action extends her attack range for a short duration.

w.name: Jubilant Veil
w.description: Nilah envelops herself in mist, increasing her movement speed and allowing her to gracefully dodge all incoming attacks. Any allies she touches during the mist's duration will also gain this effect.

e.name: Slipstream
e.description: Nilah enthusiastically dashes toward her target, dealing damage to any enemies she passes through on the way.

r.name: Apotheosis
r.description: Twirling her whip-blade in joyful exuberance, Nilah deals damage to enemies around her before pulling them closer with her weapon.

passive.name: Umbra Blades
passive.description: Every few seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for bonus physical damage and heals himself. Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown.

q.name: Duskbringer
q.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Move Speed and Attack Damage.

w.name: Shroud of Darkness
w.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.

e.name: Unspeakable Horror
e.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and applying fear to the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.

r.name: Paranoia
r.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.

passive.name: Call of the Freljord
passive.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and Move Speed of Willump and a nearby ally, and causes Willump's basic attacks to damage enemies around the target.

q.name: Consume
q.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.

w.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
w.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.

e.name: Snowball Barrage
e.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.

r.name: Absolute Zero
r.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.

passive.name: Berserker Rage
passive.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed and Life Steal based on his missing Health.

q.name: Undertow
q.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and reducing their Armor and Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reset.

w.name: Tough It Out
w.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased and he gains a Shield.

e.name: Reckless Swing
e.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.

r.name: Ragnarok
r.description: Olaf passively gains increased armor and magic resist. He can activate this ability to become immune to disables for as long as he keeps attacking.

passive.name: Clockwork Windup
passive.description: Orianna's Attacks deal additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna Attacks the same target.

q.name: Command: Attack
q.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.

w.name: Command: Dissonance
w.description: Orianna commands her Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.

e.name: Command: Protect
e.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, Shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.

r.name: Command: Shockwave
r.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.

passive.name: Living Forge
passive.description: Ornn gains an additional bonus Armor and Magic Resist from all sources.Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.Additionally, he can create masterwork items for himself and for his allies.

q.name: Volcanic Rupture
q.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.

w.name: Bellows Breath
w.description: Ornn advances, breathing fire. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.

e.name: Searing Charge
e.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.

r.name: Call of the Forge God
r.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.

passive.name: Mortal Will
passive.description: Every few spells or attacks, Pantheon's next spell is empowered.

q.name: Comet Spear
q.description: Pantheon either thrusts his spear or throws his spear in the chosen direction.

w.name: Shield Vault
w.description: Pantheon dashes to a target, damaging and stunning them.

e.name: Aegis Assault
e.description: Pantheon sets his shield, becoming invulnerable to damage from the front and striking repeatedly with his spear.

r.name: Grand Starfall
r.description: Pantheon composes himself and then leaps into the air, landing at a chosen location as a comet.

passive.name: Iron Ambassador
passive.description: Poppy throws her buckler that bounces off the target. Poppy can pick it up to gain a temporary shield.

q.name: Hammer Shock
q.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.

w.name: Steadfast Presence
w.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to gain Move Speed and stop enemy dashes around her. If a dash is stopped, the enemy is slowed and grounded.

e.name: Heroic Charge
e.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.

r.name: Keeper's Verdict
r.description: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.

passive.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
passive.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

q.name: Bone Skewer
q.description: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

w.name: Ghostwater Dive
w.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.

e.name: Phantom Undertow
e.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.

r.name: Death From Below
r.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.

passive.name: Royal Privilege
passive.description: Qiyana's first basic attack or ability against each enemy deals bonus damage.

q.name: Elemental Wrath / Edge of Ixtal
q.description: Qiyana swings her weapon, dealing damage with a bonus effect based on her element.

w.name: Terrashape
w.description: Qiyana dashes to a location and enchants her weapon with an element. Her attacks and abilities deal bonus damage while her weapon is enchanted.

e.name: Audacity
e.description: Qiyana dashes to an enemy, damaging them.

r.name: Supreme Display of Talent
r.description: Qiyana sends out a shockwave that detonates whatever elements she hits with it, stunning and damaging nearby enemies.

passive.name: Harrier
passive.description: Valor, Quinn's Demacian eagle, periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable. Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable targets will deal bonus physical damage.

q.name: Blinding Assault
q.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.

w.name: Heightened Senses
w.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Move Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.

e.name: Vault
e.description: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Move Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.

r.name: Behind Enemy Lines
r.description: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.  Ending the ability casts Skystrike, which deals damage to nearby enemies and marks champions as Vulnerable.

passive.name: Fey Feathers
passive.description: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

q.name: Gleaming Quill
q.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.

w.name: Grand Entrance
w.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.

e.name: Battle Dance
e.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.

r.name: The Quickness
r.description: Gains Move Speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.

passive.name: Spiked Shell
passive.description: Rammus gains bonus Attack Damage scaling with his Armor and Magic Resistance.

q.name: Powerball
q.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

w.name: Defensive Ball Curl
w.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, and returning damage to enemies that attack him.

e.name: Frenzying Taunt
e.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him.

r.name: Soaring Slam
r.description: Rammus hops into the air and slams down at a target area, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If cast while Rammus is in Powerball, Rammus knocks up enemies near the center as well.

passive.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
passive.description: Rek'Sai generates Fury by Attacking and hitting with basic Abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.

q.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
q.description: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that damages and reveals enemies hit.

w.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
w.description: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Unburrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.

e.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
e.description: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing physical damage, or bonus true damage if she has max Fury.While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.

r.name: Void Rush
r.description: Rek'Sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their maximum health.

passive.name: Break the Mold
passive.description: Rell's Attacks and Abilities deal additional magic damage and steal Armor and Magic Resist on hit.

q.name: Shattering Strike
q.description: Rell deals magic damage to units in a line, breaking their shields and stunning them.

w.name: Ferromancy: Crash Down
w.description: Mounted: Rell Dismounts, crashing down in her armor, Knocking enemies up and gaining a large Shield. While dismounted, she gains Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Speed, and Attack Range, but is Slowed.Dismounted: Rell forms her Mount, gaining a burst of speed and Knocking Up the next enemy she attacks.

e.name: Full Tilt
e.description: Passive: Rell gains out of combat Move Speed.Active: Rell and an ally gain ramping Move Speed, doubled toward enemies and each other. Her next Attack explodes, dealing magic damage.

r.name: Magnet Storm
r.description: Rell explodes in a magnetic fury, violently Pulling nearby enemies toward herself. Then Rell constantly Drags nearby enemies toward herself for a short while, dealing magic damage over time.

passive.name: Leverage
passive.description: Renata's Attacks deal bonus damage and mark enemies. Renata's allies can damage marked enemies to deal bonus damage.

q.name: Handshake
q.description: Renata sends out a missile rooting the first enemy hit, and can recast the ability to throw the unit in a direction.

w.name: Bailout
w.description: Renata buffs an allied champion to fight harder, delaying their death and potentially saving them if they get a takedown.

e.name: Loyalty Program
e.description: Renata sends out a pair of chemtech missiles, shielding allies and damaging and slowing enemies hit.

r.name: Hostile Takeover
r.description: Renata sends out a wave of chemicals, causing any enemies hit to go Berserk.

5.name: Masque of the Black Rose Renata Glasc

passive.name: Reign of Anger
passive.description: Renekton's attacks generate Fury, increased when he is low on life. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects.

q.name: Cull the Meek
q.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.

w.name: Ruthless Predator
w.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, destroying damage shields on the target, dealing high physical damage, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

e.name: Slice and Dice
e.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.

r.name: Dominus
r.description: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.

passive.name: Unseen Predator
passive.description: While in Brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.Rengar generates Ferocity whenever he casts an ability. At Max Ferocity, his next ability is empowered.Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, granting bonus attack damage.

q.name: Savagery
q.description: Rengar's next Attack brutally stabs his target for bonus damage.Ferocity effect: deals increased damage and grants Attack Speed.

w.name: Battle Roar
w.description: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.

e.name: Bola Strike
e.description: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.Ferocity effect: roots the target.

r.name: Thrill of the Hunt
r.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Move Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy without being in brush, reducing their armor.

passive.name: Runic Blade
passive.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, and her basic attacks expend charges to deal an additional damage.

q.name: Broken Wings
q.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.

w.name: Ki Burst
w.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.

e.name: Valor
e.description: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.

r.name: Blade of the Exile
r.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.

passive.name: Junkyard Titan
passive.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, gaining bonus Attack Speed and granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

q.name: Flamespitter
q.description: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

w.name: Scrap Shield
w.description: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

e.name: Electro Harpoon
e.description: Rumble launches a harpoon, electrocuting his target with magic damage, slowing their Move Speed, and reducing their Magic Resist. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

r.name: The Equalizer
r.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

passive.name: Arcane Mastery
passive.description: Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.

q.name: Overload
q.description: Passively, Ryze's other basic abilities reset the cooldown of Overload and charge a rune. When Ryze casts Overload with 2 runes charged, he gains a brief burst of Move Speed.On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If the target has Flux on it, Overload deals extra damage and bounces to nearby enemies with Flux.

w.name: Rune Prison
w.description: Ryze traps a target in a cage of runes, damaging them and slowing their movement. If the target has Flux on it, they are instead rooted.

e.name: Spell Flux
e.description: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs all nearby enemies. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.

r.name: Realm Warp
r.description: Passively, Overload deals even more damage against targets with Flux.On cast, Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.

passive.name: Daredevil Impulse
passive.description: Samira builds a combo by hitting attacks or abilities unique from the previous hit. Samira's attacks in melee range deal additional magic damage. Samira's attacks against enemies affected by Immobilizing effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is Knocked Up, she also keeps them Knocked Up briefly.

q.name: Flair
q.description: Samira fires a shot or swings her sword, dealing damage. If cast during Wild Rush, strike all enemies in her path upon completion.

w.name: Blade Whirl
w.description: Samira slashes around her, damaging enemies and destroying enemy missiles.

e.name: Wild Rush
e.description: Samira dashes through an enemy (including structures), slashing enemies she passes through and gaining Attack Speed. Killing an enemy champion refreshes this ability's cooldown.

r.name: Inferno Trigger
r.description: Samira unleashes a torrent of shots from her weapons, wildly shooting all enemies surrounding her.

5.name: Masque of the Black Rose Samira

passive.name: Fury of the North
passive.description: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

q.name: Arctic Assault
q.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.

w.name: Winter's Wrath
w.description: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage, slowing enemies and applying Frost stacks.

e.name: Permafrost
e.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.

r.name: Glacial Prison
r.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.

passive.name: Absolution
passive.description: When units die near Senna, their souls are periodically trapped by the Black Mist. Senna can attack these souls to free them, absorbing the Mist that held them in death. Mist fuels her Relic Cannon's power with increased Attack Damage, Attack Range, and Critical Strike Chance. Attacks from Senna's Relic Cannon take longer to fire, deal bonus damage, and briefly grant her a portion of her target's Move Speed.

q.name: Piercing Darkness
q.description: From the twin barrels of her Relic Cannon, Senna fires a unified beam of light and shadow through a target, healing allies and damaging enemies.

w.name: Last Embrace
w.description: Senna sends forth a wave of Black Mist. If it hits an enemy it latches onto them hungrily, rooting them and everything nearby after a brief delay.

e.name: Curse of the Black Mist
e.description: Senna draws the Mist she has stored in her weapon into a storm around her, embracing darkness and becoming a wraith within. Allies who enter the area are camouflaged and also appear as wraiths as the Mist shrouds them. Wraiths gain increased Move Speed, are unselectable, and hide their identities.

r.name: Dawning Shadow
r.description: Senna calls upon the relic stones of fallen Sentinels, splitting her relic cannon into a holy array of shadow and light. She then fires a global beam that shields allies from harm, while damaging enemies caught in the center.

passive.name: Stage Presence
passive.description: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

q.name: High Note
q.description: Seraphine deals damage in an area.

w.name: Surround Sound
w.description: Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.

e.name: Beat Drop
e.description: Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line.

r.name: Encore
r.description: Seraphine deals damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit.

2.name: K/DA ALL OUT Seraphine Rising Star

passive.name: Pit Grit
passive.description: Sett's basic attacks alternate between left and right punch. Right punch is slightly stronger and faster. Sett also hates losing, gaining additional health regeneration based off of his missing health.

q.name: Knuckle Down
q.description: Sett's next two attacks deal additional damage based off of the target's max health. Sett also gains Move Speed while moving towards enemy champions.

w.name: Haymaker
w.description: Sett passively stores damage he takes as Grit. On cast, Sett expends all stored Grit to gain a shield and punch an area, dealing true damage in the center and physical damage on the sides.

e.name: Facebreaker
e.description: Sett pulls in all enemies on opposite sides of him, dealing damage and stunning them. If enemies were only on one side, they are slowed instead of stunned.

r.name: The Show Stopper
r.description: Sett carries an enemy champion through the air and slams them into the ground, dealing damage and slowing all enemies near where they land.

passive.name: Backstab
passive.description: Shaco's basic attacks and Two-Shiv Poison deal additional damage when striking from behind.

q.name: Deceive
q.description: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.His first attack while Invisible is empowered, dealing bonus damage and critically striking if he attacks from behind.

w.name: Jack In The Box
w.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.

e.name: Two-Shiv Poison
e.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their Move Speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage if the target is below 30% health.

r.name: Hallucinate
r.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.

passive.name: Ki Barrier
passive.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

q.name: Twilight Assault
q.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.

w.name: Spirit's Refuge
w.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.

e.name: Shadow Dash
e.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.

r.name: Stand United
r.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.

passive.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
passive.description: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

q.name: Twin Bite
q.description: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack and grants herself Attack Speed for her next attacks. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front of Shyvana.

w.name: Burnout
w.description: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Move Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

e.name: Flame Breath
e.description: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.

r.name: Dragon's Descent
r.description: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.

passive.name: Noxious Slipstream
passive.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

q.name: Poison Trail
q.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

w.name: Mega Adhesive
w.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

e.name: Fling
e.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

r.name: Insanity Potion
r.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats, and making his Poison Trail apply Grievous Wounds.

passive.name: Glory in Death
passive.description: After being killed, Sion will temporarily reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, heal him, and deal bonus damage based on his target's maximum Health.

q.name: Decimating Smash
q.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.

w.name: Soul Furnace
w.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.

e.name: Roar of the Slayer
e.description: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.

r.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
r.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.

passive.name: Fleet of Foot
passive.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

q.name: Boomerang Blade
q.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

w.name: Ricochet
w.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks gain additional attack speed and bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage while bouncing.

e.name: Spell Shield
e.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives health and a burst of movement speed if a spell is blocked.

r.name: On The Hunt
r.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge of Move Speed for a period of time. In addition, Sivir's attacks reduce her spell cooldowns.

passive.name: Threads of Vibration
passive.description: Skarner's Attacks, Shattered Earth, Upheaval, and Impale, apply Quaking. At max stacks of Quaking, enemies take max Health magic damage over its duration.

q.name: Shattered Earth / Upheaval
q.description: Skarner rips a boulder from the earth that empowers his attacks and can be thrown as a powerful projectile.

w.name: Seismic Bastion
w.description: Skarner gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes.

e.name: Ixtal's Impact
e.description: Skarner charges forward and passes through terrain. If he collides with a champion or large monster, he'll slam them into the next wall he hits to damage and stun them.

r.name: Impale
r.description: Skarner's tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragged along by Skarner as he moves around.

passive.name: Dragon Practice
passive.description: Hitting champions with Abilities and killing enemies with Super Scorcher Breath grants a stack of Dragon Practice. Stacks increase the damage of Smolders basic Abilities.

q.name: Super Scorcher Breath
q.description: Smolder breathes fire on an enemy. As he gains more stacks, this ability becomes more powerful.

w.name: Achooo!
w.description: Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.

e.name: Flap, Flap, Flap
e.description: Smolder takes flight ignoring terrain and bombarding the lowest health enemy.

r.name: MMOOOMMMM!
r.description: Smolder calls his mom to breath fire from above, dealing extra damage and slowing enemies in the center of her fire.

passive.name: Power Chord
passive.description: Accelerando: Sona gains non-Ultimate ability haste permanently for her basic abilities as she uses her abilities well, up to a cap. Beyond that cap, further successful uses reduce her ultimate's remaining cooldown instead.Power Chord: Every few spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated.

q.name: Hymn of Valor
q.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.

w.name: Aria of Perseverance
w.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

e.name: Song of Celerity
e.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Move Speed.

r.name: Crescendo
r.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them.

passive.name: Salvation
passive.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

q.name: Starcall
q.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.

w.name: Astral Infusion
w.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

e.name: Equinox
e.description: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

r.name: Wish
r.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.

passive.name: Ravenous Flock
passive.description: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health.

q.name: Death's Hand
q.description: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

w.name: Vision of Empire
w.description: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.

e.name: Nevermove
e.description: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. Swain can then choose to pull all rooted champions closer. This ability has a shorter cooldown during Demonic Ascension.

r.name: Demonic Ascension
r.description: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate and slow nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire. This form is indefinite as long as Swain drains enemy champions.

9.name: Prestige Chosen of the Wolf Swain

passive.name: Petricite Burst
passive.description: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.

q.name: Chain Lash
q.description: Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies. After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.

w.name: Kingslayer
w.description: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

e.name: Abscond / Abduct
e.description: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.

r.name: Hijack
r.description: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.

passive.name: Transcendent
passive.description: Syndra collects Splinters of Wrath from gaining levels and damaging enemies which upgrade her abilities.Dark Sphere: Syndra can hold an additional chargeForce of Will: Bonus true damage.Scatter the Weak: Increased width and slows all targetsUnleashed Power: Executes low health targets

q.name: Dark Sphere
q.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

w.name: Force of Will
w.description: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies.

e.name: Scatter the Weak
e.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

r.name: Unleashed Power
r.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

passive.name: An Acquired Taste
passive.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

q.name: Tongue Lash
q.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion.Applies a stack of  An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed.

w.name: Abyssal Dive
w.description: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.

e.name: Thick Skin
e.description: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat.Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield.

r.name: Devour
r.description: Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally.

passive.name: Rock Surfing
passive.description: Taliyah gains Move Speed near walls.

q.name: Threaded Volley
q.description: Taliyah throws a volley of rocks in a target direction, moving freely as she casts. This creates Worked Ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on Worked Ground, she consumes the ground to throw a stronger boulder that slows enemies.

w.name: Seismic Shove
w.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.

e.name: Unraveled Earth
e.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines explode and stun them.

r.name: Weaver's Wall
r.description: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

passive.name: Blade's End
passive.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

q.name: Noxian Diplomacy
q.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

w.name: Rake
w.description: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

e.name: Assassin's Path
e.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

r.name: Shadow Assault
r.description: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Move Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.

passive.name: Bravado
passive.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

q.name: Starlight's Touch
q.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

w.name: Bastion
w.description: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

e.name: Dazzle
e.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

r.name: Cosmic Radiance
r.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

2.name: Armor of the Fifth Age Taric

passive.name: Guerrilla Warfare
passive.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.

q.name: Blinding Dart
q.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

w.name: Move Quick
w.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Move Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Move Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.

e.name: Toxic Shot
e.description: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

r.name: Noxious Trap
r.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.

passive.name: Damnation
passive.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

q.name: Death Sentence
q.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

w.name: Dark Passage
w.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

e.name: Flay
e.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

r.name: The Box
r.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

passive.name: Draw a Bead
passive.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

q.name: Rapid Fire
q.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

w.name: Rocket Jump
w.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.

e.name: Explosive Charge
e.description: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.

r.name: Buster Shot
r.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.

passive.name: King's Tribute
passive.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

q.name: Chomp
q.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.

w.name: Frozen Domain
w.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

e.name: Pillar of Ice
e.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.

r.name: Subjugate
r.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.

passive.name: Battle Fury
passive.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

q.name: Bloodlust
q.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.

w.name: Mocking Shout
w.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Move Speed reduced.

e.name: Spinning Slash
e.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

r.name: Undying Rage
r.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

passive.name: Loaded Dice
passive.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.

q.name: Wild Cards
q.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

w.name: Pick a Card
w.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

e.name: Stacked Deck
e.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.

r.name: Destiny
r.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.

passive.name: Deadly Venom
passive.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

q.name: Ambush
q.description: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Move Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

w.name: Venom Cask
w.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

e.name: Contaminate
e.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

r.name: Spray and Pray
r.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.

passive.name: Bridge Between
passive.description: Udyr has four basic Abilities that swap between Stances and can Recast an Ability to renew it with Ultimate benefits. Additionally, after using an Ability, Udyr's next two Attacks gain Attack Speed.

q.name: Wilding Claw
q.description: Udyr gains attack speed and his next two attacks deal bonus physical damage. Recast: Gain even more attack speed, and the next two attacks call lightning to strike the target.

w.name: Iron Mantle
w.description: Udyr gains a shield and his next two attacks heal him. Recast: Gain an even bigger shield and heal based on max health over the next couple seconds.

e.name: Blazing Stampede
e.description: Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds.

r.name: Wingborne Storm
r.description: Udyr surrounds himself in a glacial storm, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Recast: Empower and unleash the storm, causing it to track enemies and deal additional damage.

passive.name: Echoing Flames
passive.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

q.name: Corrosive Charge
q.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.

w.name: Purge
w.description: Urgot slows himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.

e.name: Disdain
e.description: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.

r.name: Fear Beyond Death
r.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.

passive.name: Living Vengeance
passive.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Damage and Ability Power. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

q.name: Piercing Arrow
q.description: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.

w.name: Blighted Quiver
w.description: Passive: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health. Active: Varus empowers his next Piercing Arrow.

e.name: Hail of Arrows
e.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Move Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.

r.name: Chain of Corruption
r.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.

passive.name: Night Hunter
passive.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

q.name: Tumble
q.description: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

w.name: Silver Bolts
w.description: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.

e.name: Condemn
e.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.

r.name: Final Hour
r.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter

passive.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
passive.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

q.name: Baleful Strike
q.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.

w.name: Dark Matter
w.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.

e.name: Event Horizon
e.description: Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.

r.name: Primordial Burst
r.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

passive.name: Organic Deconstruction
passive.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

q.name: Plasma Fission
q.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.

w.name: Void Rift
w.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.

e.name: Tectonic Disruption
e.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

r.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
r.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

passive.name: Doom 'n Gloom
passive.description: Vex periodically becomes empowered, causing her next basic Ability to fear enemies and interrupt dashes. Whenever a nearby enemy dashes, Vex applies a mark that can be consumed for bonus damage that also reduces the cooldown of her empowered state.

q.name: Mistral Bolt
q.description: Launch a damaging missile that accelerates mid-flight.

w.name: Personal Space
w.description: Gain a shield and damage nearby enemies.

e.name: Looming Darkness
e.description: Summon a damaging and slowing zone that applies Gloom to enemies.

r.name: Shadow Surge
r.description: Fire a missile that marks an enemy champion.  Recast to dash to them and deal damage.

passive.name: Blast Shield
passive.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

q.name: Vault Breaker
q.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.

w.name: Denting Blows
w.description: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.

e.name: Relentless Force
e.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.

r.name: Cease and Desist
r.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.

passive.name: Sovereign's Domination
passive.description: Enemies who fall before Viego become wraiths. By attacking a wraith, Viego temporarily seizes control of the dead enemy's body, healing for a percentage of his target's max health and gaining access to their basic abilities and items. He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own.

q.name: Blade of the Ruined King
q.description: Viego's spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health.Viego can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him.

w.name: Spectral Maw
w.description: Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit.

e.name: Harrowed Path
e.description: Viego commands the Black Mist to haunt and surround a piece of terrain. Viego can hide in the Mist as a wraith, gaining camouflage, Move Speed, and Attack Speed.

r.name: Heartbreaker
r.description: Viego teleports to a nearby location and executes an enemy champion on arrival, piercing their heart and causing a destructive shockwave around them that knocks away their allies.

passive.name: Glorious Evolution
passive.description: Viktor gains Hex Fragments whenever he kills an enemy. With every 100 Hex Fragments he obtains, Viktor permanently augments an active ability. After upgrading all of his basic abilities, he can gather 100 Hex Fragments to augment his ultimate ability.

q.name: Siphon Power
q.description: Viktor blasts an enemy unit with magic damage, which grants him a shield and empowers his next basic attack.Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus move speed after casting the Ability.

w.name: Gravity Field
w.description: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies caught within its radius. Enemies who stay in the field for too long become stunned.Augment: Viktor's spells apply a slow to enemies.

e.name: Hextech Ray
e.description: Viktor uses his biomechanical arm to fire a Hextech Ray that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.Augment: An explosion follows in the Hextech Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.

r.name: Arcane Storm
r.description: Viktor conjures an Arcane Storm on the field, dealing magic damage and interrupting enemy channels. The storm periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies and can be redirected by Viktor.Augment: The Arcane Storm moves 25% faster, and whenever champions die after taking damage from it, the storm grows and increases in its duration.

passive.name: Crimson Pact
passive.description: Every 30 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.6 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

q.name: Transfusion
q.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.

w.name: Sanguine Pool
w.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

e.name: Tides of Blood
e.description: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.

r.name: Hemoplague
r.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.

13.name: Masque of the Black Rose Vladimir

passive.name: The Relentless Storm
passive.description: Volibear's Attacks and abilities grant Attack Speed, and eventually cause his Attacks to deal bonus magic damage to nearby enemies.

q.name: Thundering Smash
q.description: Volibear gains speed towards enemies, Stunning and damaging the first one he Attacks.

w.name: Frenzied Maul
w.description: Volibear damages an enemy, applying on-hit effects and marking them.  Casting this ability again on the same target deals bonus damage and Heals Volibear.

e.name: Sky Splitter
e.description: Volibear summons a lightning bolt at a location, dealing damage and Slowing enemies while granting Volibear a Shield if he's inside the blast radius.

r.name: Stormbringer
r.description: Volibear leaps to a target location, Slowing and damaging enemies beneath him while gaining bonus Health.  Enemy towers near his landing location become temporarily disabled.

passive.name: Eternal Hunger
passive.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

q.name: Jaws of the Beast
q.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

w.name: Blood Hunt
w.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 25% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

e.name: Primal Howl
e.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

r.name: Infinite Duress
r.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

passive.name: Clean Cuts
passive.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a Feather.

q.name: Double Daggers
q.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

w.name: Deadly Plumage
w.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her Attack Speed and damage while also granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion.

e.name: Bladecaller
e.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

r.name: Featherstorm
r.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

passive.name: Mana Surge
passive.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana. Whenever Xerath kills a unit, this cooldown is reduced.

q.name: Arcanopulse
q.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

w.name: Eye of Destruction
w.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

e.name: Shocking Orb
e.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

r.name: Rite of the Arcane
r.description: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

passive.name: Determination
passive.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

q.name: Three Talon Strike
q.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.

w.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
w.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward, slowing affected enemies and marking them as Challenged.

e.name: Audacious Charge
e.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, gaining increased Attack Speed and dealing damage to all enemies in the area, slowing them briefly. This Ability gains increased range against Challenged targets.

r.name: Crescent Guard
r.description: Xin Zhao passively challenges an enemy he damaged recently. When activated, Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back, becoming impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.

passive.name: Way of the Wanderer
passive.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

q.name: Steel Tempest
